name: Chores!
description:
Let's show Mom how good you are at doing all the chores of the house, and get paid for doing them !
- Rug Cleaning
- Make Breakfast
- Clean Pool
- Wash Car
- Window Cleaning
- Shoe Polishing
- Raking Leaves
- Mowing Lawn
- Doing Dishes
- Ironing Clothes
- Water Plants
& many more .
Do the Chores - Earn Allowance - Decorate you Room !
